snippet: The United States Postal Service said Thursday that it would raise postage rates on Jan. 27, including a 1-cent increase in the cost of first-class mail to 46 cents.
abstract: United States Postal Service says that it will raise postage rates in January 2013, including 1-cent increase in cost of first-class mail; service will also increase rates on its shipping services.
lead_paragraph: The United States Postal Service said Thursday that it would raise postage rates on Jan. 27, including a 1-cent increase in the cost of first-class mail to 46 cents.

headline.main: Higher Postage Rates Coming in January
headline.print_headline: Higher Postage Rates Coming in January
